# ![Remedy logo](static/img/icon.svg) Remedy

[![GitHub package.json version](https://img.shields.io/github/package-json/v/iansannar/remedy?label=version&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/iansannar/remedy/tree/main) [![Website](https://img.shields.io/website?down_color=inactive&down_message=unavailable&label=online%20rulebook&logoColor=white&logo=image/svg+xml;base64,&style=flat-square&up_color=0cd0dc&up_message=read%20now&url=https%3A%2F%2Fremedy.neonfable.com)](https://remedy.neonfable.com) [![Last commit on Github](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/iansannar/remedy?label=updated&logo=Github&logoColor=white&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/iansannar/remedy/commits/master) [![Download](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/iansannar/remedy?include_prereleases&label=download&logo=Adobe-Acrobat-Reader&logoColor=white&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/iansannar/remedy/releases/latest)

Remedy is a tabletop role-playing game meant to provide new players with simplicity and veterans with options, but most of all build an environment in which balanced and fun homebrew content can be developed.
